name: USGS Principal Aquifers - Projected Depletion Model

properties.name: Floridan Aquifer System
properties.note: Volume remains high due to recharge, but saline intrusion reduces 'usable' freshwater.

properties.name: Edwards-Trinity aquifer system
properties.note: Volume fluctuates wildly with drought. Long term trend is slight decline due to urban pressure.
